name: Short and Simple 1
description:
This is the first in a series of short and simple games I have created as I figure out my way around UE5.

Instructions:

You are stuck in a dessert valley with your fellow robot pal. There are a collection of doors at the end of the valley that you need to open so that you can escape.

Controls

1. Click and point to move your character.

2. Space to drop an orb that your friend will follow.
